basics.name: Michael
basics.label: Store Operations and Management
basics.summary: I am a determined, hard-working individual with the zeal to accomplish any task or challenge I'm given, seeking to exceed expectations. In the next year, I plan to achieve a bachelor's degree in Environmental Technology and Management, and attain a job in the field of sustainable design and technologies.

work.name: Michael's Arts and Crafts Store
work.summary: Aid Store Manager, Assistant Store Manager, Full-Time Replenishment Manager in day to day operations and planning; unload and stock store merchandise. Train new Replenishment associates.

projects.name: Richard R. Lee Estate (Clayton, NC) Phase III Environmental Site Assessment
